title: Ripple vs SEC Lawsuit Update: XRP Price Gains 13% as Deadline Closes In
body: The post Ripple vs SEC Lawsuit Update: XRP Price Gains 13% as Deadline Closes In appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The long-running legal battle between Ripple and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) continues to keep the crypto community on edge. The deadline for a crucial status report in the case has allegedly officially passed, but there’s still no confirmation from the court about whether it was submitted. According to AI assistant Grok, a major update in the case — either a status report or a court ruling — was expected today, June 16, 2025. Based on usual court filing hours, it should have arrived by now. However, delays are possible, with the next likely dates being June 19 or even as far out as August. Despite the legal uncertainty, XRP’s price has been on the rise. Over the past 24 hours, it has gained about 7%, moving up nicely as broader market sentiment improves. Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other major cryptocurrencies are also showing gains. What’s Next For XRP Price? XRP is currently trading at $2.31 on the daily chart. Over the past few days, XRP has been hovering between a support level around $2.10 to $2.25 and a resistance level between $2.31 and $2.36. This sideways movement has kept the market quiet without any major breakouts or breakdowns. There’s also a possible head and shoulders pattern forming on the chart, which could be a bearish sign for XRP. However, this pattern would only be confirmed if the price drops below $2.25. If Bitcoin pushes higher in the short term, XRP and other altcoins might follow with a small price jump. But any upside is likely to be limited for now, as the market waits for clearer signals.

The price has bounced from the lower Bollinger Band at approximately $0.322 and is approaching the mid-band resistance near $0.383. RSI is currently at 37.42, still in bearish territory but gradually climbing, indicating early signs of strengthening momentum. A successful break above $0.383 could confirm a short-term reversal toward the upper band near $0.444. However, failure to reclaim the mid-band may lead to renewed selling pressure. Price action has moved above the middle Bollinger Band ($0.336), currently testing the upper band near $0.353, indicating growing upward momentum. title: Egrag Crypto Calls XRP the Financial Nuclear Weapon of Digital Era. Here’s why
body: While Bitcoin and Ethereum often dominate the public conversation, analysts have continued to champion XRP, informing the community it is no longer a speculative asset but the foundation of a technological infrastructure ready for institutional adoption. EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto), a popular analyst on X, recently highlighted XRP’s advantages, comparing the asset to a nuclear weapon that can change the course of a war. He referred the community to a post he shared in February 2024, where he delved deeper into the XRP ecosystem’s features and reasons why it can reshape global finance. ONLY FEW #XRP possesses the transformational power to reshape the very essence of the global financial system. Much like a nuclear weapon alters the course of warfare. Read the Full post https://t.co/PXqNoS69wM — EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto) June 15, 2025 Infrastructure Built for Functionality Unlike many cryptocurrencies, XRP was engineered for scalability, low-cost transactions, and integration into existing financial processes. The XRP Ledger (XRPL) supports rapid settlements with minimal energy usage. This sets it apart from proof-of-work networks, such as Bitcoin. Ripple president Monica Long recently revealed that XRP is 120,000 times more efficient than BTC , and this focus on efficiency and utility has shaped the asset’s identity as a purpose-built system for financial applications. A Game-changing Ecosystem EGRAG CRYPTO noted that, unlike Bitcoin, XRP avoids the concerns tied to a pseudonymous founder holding an outsized supply. While some detractors claim XRP is centralized, experts, including Ripple’s Chief Technology Officer (CTO) David Schwartz, have debunked these claims . At the same time, XRP delivers features uncommon in many other blockchain ecosystems, such as built-in decentralized exchange capabilities, smart contract support through Hooks, and compatibility with tokenized real-world assets . We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 According to the analyst, these elements position XRP to meet a range of use cases, including cross-border payments, remittances, decentralized finance, microtransactions, and supply chain applications. He also highlighted the automated market maker (AMM) functionality and a global decentralized exchange ecosystem as extensions of the XRPL’s capabilities. Legal Positioning and Institutional Confidence While Ripple’s protracted legal battle with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is burdensome, it has given XRP legal clarity unmatched by many digital assets. For analysts like EGRAG CRYPTO, this clarity has strengthened its position. The asset’s resilience through regulatory pressure and market volatility has become part of its identity, signaling its durability in high-stakes environments. Importantly, XRP’s trajectory is no longer confined to the crypto-native audience. EGRAG CRYPTO’s post describes the interest of institutional players such as BlackRock and Fidelity, whose recognition of XRP’s long-term potential may mark a shift from exploratory engagement to strategic positioning. As the analyst noted, XRP is the financial nuclear weapon of the digital era. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author’s personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid’s opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on X , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post Egrag Crypto Calls XRP the Financial Nuclear Weapon of Digital Era. Here’s why appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: SPX6900 price target: bullish market structure eyes a pump to $2.20
body: SPX 6900 is showing powerful bullish momentum, rallying 18.20 percent on the day and continuing its streak of higher highs and higher lows. Price is now approaching a potential breakout zone, with strong support below and a bullish continuation pattern forming on the chart. A Fibonacci extension points to $2.20 as the next major upside target, if current structure holds. After bottoming out near the $0.25 region, SPX6900 ( SPX6900 ) has been in a strong uptrend, marked by consecutive higher lows and higher highs. This structure has consistently reclaimed major volume levels and flipped resistance into support. Now, with price consolidating just under all-time highs and forming what could be a bullish pennant, traders are watching for a continuation move toward the $2.20 region. Key technical points Value Area High + Daily Support at $1.42: As long as price holds above this zone, the uptrend remains structurally intact. Bullish Pennant Formation Possible: Price is consolidating just beneath ATH, with converging support and resistance pointing to a breakout setup. Fibonacci Extension Target at $2.20: Taken from the last swing low to high, the 0.618 extension projects further upside if breakout occurs. SPX6900/USDT (1D) Chart, Source: TradingView SPX 6900’s market structure remains one of the strongest in the current cycle. After establishing a macro low around $0.25, price action reversed sharply, reclaiming the 200-day moving average, breaking past major volume profile levels, and confirming each breakout with a bullish retest. This has led to the formation of solid high-timeframe support zones, which continue to hold. Most recently, a key reaction came from the 0.618 Fibonacci retracement, which produced a strong rally into all-time high territory. Now, price appears to be consolidating in a pennant formation, a classic continuation setup where price coils in equilibrium before a decisive breakout. This pause in momentum is backed by strong volume, suggesting healthy buying interest and sustainable trend conditions. You might also like: Michael Saylor’s Strategy strengthens Bitcoin bet with 10,100 BTC purchase The current critical support zone lies between the value area high and daily support at $1.42. As long as price remains above this level, and the pennant structure continues to develop, a breakout toward $2.20, the 0.618 Fibonacci extension from the last leg, becomes increasingly probable. What to expect in the coming price action SPX 6900 remains in a high-momentum uptrend, and the current consolidation phase could lead to another impulsive breakout. If the $1.42 support zone holds and price breaks above the pennant, a move toward $2.20 is the next likely target. Until structure fails, bullish continuation remains the base case.

title: Amazon Taps Nuclear Energy to Power AI Data Centers in New Talen Deal
body: Amazon Inks Nuclear Deal to Power AI Ambitions Amazon signed a large nuclear power agreement with Talen Energy to supply 1,920 megawatts (MW) of power to its AI-driven data centers. The deal will last through 2042 and marks a significant move toward clean, high-capacity energy for the tech giant’s infrastructure. The electricity will be supplied by Talen’s Susquehanna nuclear facility in Pennsylvania and travel over the local grid, serving both Amazon operations and grid reliability. Powering the Grid, Supporting Innovation Rather than direct supply, the energy will be provided through PPL Electric Utilities. The company’s president, Christine Martin, noted that such high-load connections allow for the offset of other consumers’ cost of energy. Connecting large data center loads to our transmission grid helps lower the transmission portion of energy costs for all,” she said. Amazon’s agreement also includes exploring the future deployment of small modular reactor (SMR) technology—a next-generation nuclear technology that is designed with scalability and efficiency in mind. Tech Giants Embrace Nuclear for AI Infrastructure Amazon is the latest in a string of tech firms embracing nuclear power. In September 2024, Microsoft agreed with Constellation Energy to reopen the Three Mile Island plant, securing 835MW for AI needs. Earlier this month, Meta inked a 20-year deal to purchase 1.1 gigawatts of nuclear energy from the same provider, marking a broader shift in tech toward green, high-capacity power solutions. Political Momentum Behind Nuclear Expansion The momentum has caught up with US policymakers, including President Donald Trump, who continues to demand increased nuclear investment. Trump views nuclear power as key to energizing AI, cryptocurrency mining, and high-performance computing as the U.S. struggles to keep pace with global tech development. With Amazon’s recent move, the nuclear renaissance has another heavyweight believer—one dedicated to energizing the AI future.

title: MemeStrategy Makes Strategic Solana SOL Acquisition
body: BitcoinWorld MemeStrategy Makes Strategic Solana SOL Acquisition In a notable move within the digital asset space, MemeStrategy, a Hong Kong-listed entity focused on the virtual asset ecosystem, has announced a significant crypto investment. The company has reportedly acquired 2,440 units of Solana (SOL), one of the leading altcoins by market capitalization. This purchase, valued at approximately HK$2.9 million (around US$370,000), signals a strategic allocation by a listed company into a prominent blockchain network. The news, initially reported by Solid Intel on X, highlights the increasing trend of companies integrating digital assets into their balance sheets or strategic operations. Understanding MemeStrategy’s Strategic Move Who exactly is MemeStrategy ? As a Hong Kong-listed virtual asset ecosystem venture, MemeStrategy operates within the burgeoning digital finance sector. Its listing in Hong Kong places it within a jurisdiction that is actively positioning itself as a global hub for virtual assets, implementing regulatory frameworks to support the industry’s growth. A company like MemeStrategy, focused on this ecosystem, would naturally explore various facets of the digital asset landscape, including direct investments in promising blockchain protocols and cryptocurrencies. Their business model likely involves developing or supporting applications, platforms, or services related to virtual assets. Investing directly in a major cryptocurrency like Solana could serve multiple strategic purposes: Balance Sheet Management: Holding digital assets as part of their corporate treasury strategy. Ecosystem Participation: Gaining exposure or potentially participating directly in the Solana ecosystem through staking, development, or using its network. Industry Exposure: Deepening their involvement and understanding of a leading Layer 1 blockchain. Why Solana SOL? The Appeal of a High-Performance Network The choice of Solana SOL for this investment is particularly interesting. Solana is renowned for its high transaction throughput and low costs, making it a popular platform for decentralized applications (dApps), NFTs, and DeFi protocols. While it has faced technical challenges in the past, its ecosystem continues to grow and attract developers and users. For a virtual asset company, investing in SOL could be motivated by several factors: Technological Potential: Belief in Solana’s underlying technology and its ability to scale. Ecosystem Growth: Anticipation of continued expansion and adoption of projects built on Solana. Market Position: Recognizing SOL as a top-tier cryptocurrency with significant liquidity and market presence. Future Integration: Potential plans to build on or integrate with the Solana network in the future. The investment of HK$2.9 million into 2,440 SOL suggests a calculated entry into the market, potentially based on a long-term view of Solana’s value proposition within the virtual asset space. What Does This Mean for Hong Kong Crypto? This acquisition by a Hong Kong crypto listed company is a positive indicator for the region’s ambition to become a major virtual asset center. Hong Kong has been proactive in establishing a regulatory framework for virtual asset service providers (VASPs) and encouraging licensed platforms to operate. While MemeStrategy’s core business and listing status are relevant here, a Hong Kong-listed entity making a direct, reported investment in a major altcoin like SOL adds weight to the narrative that digital assets are gaining legitimacy and adoption within the city’s financial ecosystem. Such moves by publicly listed companies can: Boost confidence in the local virtual asset market. Signal increasing institutional comfort with digital asset exposure. Potentially pave the way for more traditional companies to explore similar investments. It aligns with Hong Kong’s broader strategy to embrace Web3 and virtual assets, attracting both local and international players. Analyzing the Crypto Investment: Details and Implications The specific details of the crypto investment – 2,440 SOL for HK$2.9 million – provide a snapshot of the transaction size. At the time of the report, this implies an average price per SOL of approximately HK$1188.5 (or roughly US$152). Understanding the precise timing relative to market fluctuations would give more context, but the headline remains the strategic decision by MemeStrategy to allocate capital to this asset. Implications of this investment: Benefits: Potential appreciation of the SOL holding if the market performs well. Increased visibility and credibility for MemeStrategy within the crypto community. Strategic positioning for future involvement in the Solana ecosystem. Challenges: Exposure to the inherent volatility of the cryptocurrency market. Regulatory uncertainty, although Hong Kong is clarifying its stance. Technical risks associated with holding and managing digital assets securely. Actionable Insights: Investors tracking MemeStrategy may see this as a sign of the company’s confidence in Solana. It highlights that publicly listed companies, especially those in the virtual asset sector, are actively engaging with direct crypto exposure. This could be a precursor to more significant institutional inflows into SOL and other major altcoins. The Growing Trend for a Virtual Asset Company MemeStrategy’s move underscores a potentially growing trend where a virtual asset company , even if listed on a traditional exchange, is comfortable holding significant amounts of cryptocurrencies other than just Bitcoin or Ethereum. While companies like MicroStrategy famously hold large Bitcoin reserves, this investment in SOL by MemeStrategy suggests a broader view of the digital asset landscape, including prominent altcoins. Examples of companies with crypto on their balance sheets: MicroStrategy: Holds substantial Bitcoin. Tesla: Has held Bitcoin (though amounts have varied). Other Crypto-Native Companies: Many exchanges, miners, and blockchain firms hold various cryptocurrencies as part of their operations or treasury. MemeStrategy fits into this latter category but with the added layer of being a publicly listed entity in a jurisdiction aiming to be a crypto hub. This makes their strategic choices, particularly regarding asset allocation, noteworthy for observing market trends and corporate adoption patterns. Conclusion: A Strategic Step in the Virtual Asset Landscape MemeStrategy’s acquisition of 2,440 SOL is more than just a transaction; it’s a strategic statement. It signifies a Hong Kong-listed virtual asset company’s confidence in Solana and its willingness to directly engage with major altcoins. This move aligns with Hong Kong’s broader efforts to foster a robust virtual asset ecosystem and could serve as an example for other companies exploring digital asset exposure. While challenges like market volatility remain, the investment highlights the increasing integration of cryptocurrencies into the strategic operations and balance sheets of companies operating within, or adjacent to, the virtual asset space. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Solana price action. This post MemeStrategy Makes Strategic Solana SOL Acquisition first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: XPLA Unveils Crucial FTX Relief Fund Token Return Portal on July 2
body: BitcoinWorld XPLA Unveils Crucial FTX Relief Fund Token Return Portal on July 2 The world of cryptocurrency is constantly evolving, bringing both incredible opportunities and unexpected challenges. One of the most significant disruptions in recent memory was the collapse of the FTX exchange, which left countless users facing substantial losses. In the wake of this event, many projects stepped up to support their communities. XPLA , the blockchain mainnet operated by Com2uS Holdings, was one such project, establishing a dedicated relief fund to aid affected users holding XPLA Token . Now, a significant next step in this recovery process is about to begin. XPLA has officially announced the launch of its relief fund token return process, set to commence on July 2nd . This initiative provides eligible users with a dedicated portal to return the tokens previously allocated to them through the relief fund. It’s a move that underscores XPLA’s commitment to its community and the long-term health of its ecosystem. Understanding the XPLA FTX Relief Fund: A Community Lifeline Following the dramatic events surrounding the FTX collapse in late 2022, many individuals found their digital assets trapped or significantly impacted. Recognizing the hardship faced by its community members who held XPLA Token on the affected platform, XPLA established a proactive FTX Relief Fund in 2023. The primary goal was to provide a measure of support and stability to these users during a turbulent time. The fund was not just a symbolic gesture; it involved a tangible distribution of XPLA Token . According to XPLA’s announcement, the fund successfully distributed a total of 16.21 million XPLA . This significant allocation reached 615 users who met the eligibility criteria related to their holdings on FTX at the time of its collapse. This action demonstrated a commitment to mitigating the negative effects of an external crisis on its user base. Creating such a fund involved several complex steps, including identifying affected users, verifying their holdings, and securely distributing the tokens. It was a necessary measure to help users regain some footing and maintain their participation within the XPLA ecosystem despite the external shock. Why is XPLA Launching a Token Return Process Now? While the initial distribution of the FTX Relief Fund tokens was crucial for immediate support, launching a return process signals a transition. It suggests that the immediate crisis phase has passed, and the focus is shifting towards managing the long-term implications of that distribution and potentially optimizing the ecosystem’s tokenomics. The core reason for facilitating returns is likely tied to the potential for token burning . Token burning is a process where a certain amount of cryptocurrency is permanently removed from circulation. This is typically done by sending the tokens to a burn address, which is an inaccessible wallet. Burning tokens can potentially reduce the total supply, which, under certain economic conditions and demand, could positively impact the value of the remaining tokens. It can also be seen as a way to return value to the ecosystem and its participants. By allowing users to return the allocated tokens, XPLA is creating a pool of tokens that could then be subject to a governance vote for burning. This approach is highly aligned with the principles of decentralization inherent in blockchain technology. Instead of a central authority unilaterally deciding the fate of these tokens, the decision is put into the hands of the XPLA Token holders themselves through the governance mechanism. How Will the XPLA Token Return Process Work? Actionable Steps Starting July 2nd, eligible users who received tokens from the FTX Relief Fund will be able to participate in the return process. XPLA has announced the launch of a new dedicated portal for this purpose. While specific step-by-step instructions will likely be provided closer to the launch date, here’s a general outline of what eligible users can expect: Access the Portal: Users will need to navigate to the designated XPLA return portal. The exact URL will be provided by XPLA through their official communication channels (like their X account, as mentioned in the initial announcement, and likely their official website). Verification: Users will likely need to connect their wallet or log in using the method specified by XPLA to verify their eligibility and identify the amount of relief fund tokens they received. Initiate Return: Within the portal, there will be an option to initiate the return of the allocated tokens. Users will need to follow the on-screen instructions. Confirm Transaction: The process will involve a blockchain transaction to send the tokens from the user’s wallet back to a designated address controlled by XPLA for the return process. Users should carefully review all details before confirming the transaction. Important Considerations for Users: Ensure you are using the official XPLA portal to avoid phishing scams. Always verify the URL. Understand the amount you are eligible to return based on the initial relief fund distribution. Be aware of any potential transaction fees associated with sending the tokens back (though these are typically minimal on blockchain networks). The return process is likely voluntary. Users should consider their own circumstances before deciding whether or not to return tokens. What Happens After Tokens Are Returned? The Governance Vote The tokens collected through the return portal will not immediately disappear. They will be held in a designated address pending a crucial decision by the XPLA community. XPLA has stated that returned tokens may be permanently burned pending a governance vote . This means the fate of the returned 16.21 million XPLA (or whatever portion of it is returned by users) rests with the holders of XPLA Token who participate in the governance process. Governance on blockchain networks allows token holders to vote on proposals related to the network’s future development, parameters, and in this case, tokenomics. The governance proposal regarding the burning of returned tokens will likely outline: The total amount of tokens collected through the return portal. The proposal to burn these tokens permanently. The rationale behind the proposed burn (e.g., reducing supply, enhancing scarcity, benefiting the ecosystem). The voting period and the mechanism for casting votes. Participating in Governance: If you are a holder of XPLA Token , participating in this vote is your opportunity to have a say in the ecosystem’s direction. Information on how to participate in XPLA governance will be available through official XPLA channels. Potential Impact of Token Burning on the XPLA Ecosystem If the governance vote passes and the returned tokens are burned, it could have several potential impacts on the XPLA ecosystem and the XPLA Token itself: Potential Benefit Explanation Increased Scarcity Burning tokens permanently removes them from the total supply, making the remaining tokens scarcer. Potential Price Impact While not guaranteed, reduced supply combined with stable or increasing demand can theoretically lead to upward pressure on the token’s price. Enhanced Ecosystem Health Burning can be seen as a deflationary mechanism, which some argue is beneficial for a token’s long-term economic model. Community Empowerment Putting the decision to a governance vote strengthens community involvement and decentralized decision-making. It’s important to note that market prices are influenced by numerous factors, and burning tokens is just one element. However, it’s a significant event for the token’s supply mechanics. XPLA’s Commitment to Crypto Recovery and Community Trust This entire process, from establishing the initial fund to launching a transparent return mechanism and proposing a community-driven burn, highlights XPLA’s dedication to its users and the broader principles of Crypto Recovery . In an industry often criticized for lack of accountability during crises, XPLA’s actions stand out as a proactive measure to support those affected by an event outside of its direct control. Providing a pathway for users to return tokens they may no longer feel the need for, and then allowing the community to decide the fate of those tokens, builds trust and reinforces the decentralized nature of the project. This initiative is more than just a logistical process; it’s a statement about XPLA’s values and its long-term vision for a resilient and community-governed blockchain network. It contributes positively to the narrative around Crypto Recovery efforts within the digital asset space. What Does This Mean for the Future of XPLA? The successful execution of the token return process and the subsequent governance vote are key milestones for XPLA. They demonstrate operational capability and a commitment to involving the community in important decisions. Depending on the outcome of the vote, the total supply of XPLA Token could be reduced, potentially impacting future tokenomics and value propositions. This event also sets a precedent for how XPLA handles significant token distributions and potential adjustments in the future. It reinforces the importance of the governance mechanism as a core component of the network’s evolution. As a leading player in Blockchain News , we observe these events closely as indicators of a project’s health and maturity. XPLA’s approach here appears to be a responsible and community-oriented way of addressing the lingering effects of the FTX situation while potentially enhancing the value proposition for all XPLA Token holders. Conclusion: A Step Forward for XPLA and its Community The launch of the XPLA relief fund token return portal on July 2nd marks an important phase in the project’s response to the FTX collapse. By providing a clear mechanism for users to return allocated tokens and proposing a community-driven decision on their potential burning, XPLA is demonstrating transparency, responsibility, and a strong belief in decentralized governance. This process not only addresses the practicalities of the relief fund distribution but also sets the stage for a potential reduction in the total supply of XPLA Token , which could have positive long-term implications for the ecosystem. It’s a compelling example of a blockchain project actively working towards Crypto Recovery and empowering its community. Eligible users should prepare to access the new portal on July 2nd if they wish to participate in the return. All XPLA Token holders should pay attention to the upcoming governance proposal regarding the potential token burn, as their vote will play a direct role in shaping the future tokenomics of the XPLA network. To learn more about the latest Blockchain News trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Crypto Recovery efforts and institutional adoption. title: Key Fractal From 2023 Says Bitcoin Price Is Still Bullish, But A Crash To $90,000 Could Be Coming
body: Crypto analyst X Force has drawn the crypto community’s attention to a key fractal from 2023, which paints a bullish picture for the Bitcoin price. However, the analyst suggested that a drop to $90,000 could still be on the cards for BTC, although that won’t invalidate the macro setup. Key Fractal Shows Bitcoin Price Is Still Bullish In an X post, X Force highlighted a key fractal from the early phase of the 2023 bull market and noted why it supports the view that the current trend remains bullish. He remarked that the price structure that was observed back then could offer insights relevant to the current analysis, as history often rhymes even though it might not repeat itself exactly. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Crash To $94,000 Imminent As Fibonacci Resistance Is At Stake X Force then noted that in 2023, a larger degree wave 1 terminated, followed by a shallow wave 2 that retraced only to the 23.6% to 38.2% Fibonacci levels. The analyst then declared that this interpretation wasn’t just hindsight but it was the only valid count even in real-time. He also raised the possibility of the Bitcoin price creating another low. X Force explained that the context of the micro timeframes is losing weight as every bounce and dump is extremely sensitive to the overall creation of the wave structure. Meanwhile, the analyst indicated that the Bitcoin price could still drop to as low as $90,000 but noted that it is important that BTC remains above this critical support level. In an X post, the crypto analyst stated that as long as the Bitcoin price stays above the $90,000 level, the implications of the shorter-term price action have zero impact on the overall macro trend. X Force added that pullbacks and choppiness are not only healthy but vital to any bull market. A BTC Price Crash Imminent? Veteran trader Peter Brandt has raised the possibility of a Bitcoin price crash happening soon. In an X post, he questioned if November 2021 was happening all over again for the flagship crypto. His accompanying chart showed how that period formed the cycle peak for BTC, following a double top formation. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Above $107,000 Is Ideal, But Don’t Get Excited Until This Happens The Bitcoin price then crashed from its all-time high (ATH) of around $69,000 and consolidated for over two years before witnessing another breakout in 2024. The chart indicated that BTC may have formed a double top again following the recent rally to a new all-time high of $111,900. If so, this could mark the end of the cycle’s bull run, with a crash set to follow. However, the chart suggested that BTC could sustain this bull run if it holds above $104,612. At the time of writing, the Bitcoin price is trading at around $106,700, up in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap. Featured image from Pixabay, chart from Tradingview.com
tags: Bitcoin|bitcoin|Bitcoin news|bitcoin price|btc|BTC news|btc price|btcusd|BTCUSDT|CoinMarketCap|Fibonacci Levels|Peter Brandt|X Force

title: European crypto ETPs continue to attract interest
body: Digital assets manager 21Shares has announced the cross-listing of five crypto exchange-traded products (ETPs) on the Nasdaq Stockholm exchange. With the move, the issuer has ten products listed on the Swedish exchange. According to its official announcement , the newly listed ETPs are Uniswap (AUNI), Avalanche (AVAX), Bitcoin Gold (BOLD), Solana Core Staking (CSOL), and Ethereum Core (ETHC). 21Shares existing products on the exchange already include ETPs for Bitcoin (ABTC), Ethereum (AETH), Solana (ASOL), XRP (AXRP), and Bitcoin Core (CBTC). According to the firm, its expansion is part of its effort to increase its presence in the Nordic region and give investors access to regulated and transparent digital asset products. Its head of Financial Product Development, Mandy Chiu, noted that these products allow investors to diversify their portfolios and make them more resilient. She said: “Our continued expansion in the Nordic region reflects the increasing demand from both retail and institutional investors for diversified and cost-effective crypto exposure.” Meanwhile, the head of ETF & ETP for Nasdaq European Markets, Helena Wedin, expressed excitement about the new products from 21Shares. Hedin said that the new ETPs reflect the current wave of innovation in the financial sector while highlighting the exchange’s role in bringing the product to the masses. 21Shares sees over $200 million in outflows YTD Meanwhile, 21Shares is Europe’s biggest digital assets product issuer, with listings on six exchanges, including Euronext Paris and Amsterdam, SIX Swiss Exchange, and London Stock Exchange. It has recently listed Hedera (HBAR) and Cronos (CRO) ETPs on Euronext Paris and Amsterdam. However, its reach extends beyond Europe, with the asset issuer also having a spot in Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds listed in the US. Interestingly, it is currently pending ETF applications for altcoins before the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) While it has dozens of ETPs, three of which are in the top 20 for assets under management (AUM) in Europe , 21Shares products have struggled with outflows from most of its products this year. According to CoinShares data, the firm currently has an outflow of $212 million year-to-date for its products. The massive outflow is likely because most of the underlying products for its ETPs are altcoins, which have struggled to see sizable gains in 2025. Still, 21Shares reported a $4 million inflow last week, taking its month-to-date flow to a positive $6 million. European crypto ETPs continue to attract interest Despite the struggles of 21Shares, the crypto ETP market in Europe is growing. Germany particularly has attracted significant inflows into digital assets products this year with $908 million, a record that is only bested by the US, according to CoinShares data. Retail investors have been the driving force behind these inflows, but institutional investors are showing interest. According to ETF Stream , Fund-of-fund allocation to crypto ETPs has increased from €45 million to €138 million between 2023 and 2025. While it still accounts for only a small portion of total asset under management (AUM) ETPs, it indicates that more professional investors are paying attention to crypto investment products. Meanwhile, more retail investors will likely have access to crypto ETPs soon, with the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) disclosing recently that it wants to lift the ban on retail investors buying crypto exchange-traded notes (ETNs). With the UK having about 30 ETNs listed on its exchange, the decision could attract more inflows to the asset class. Interestingly, Europe has about 130 crypto ETPs listed across various exchanges, many of which are available to the public. However, the US could soon see as many products with more than 70 crypto ETF applications currently before the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). title: Time for Major Leg Up in Silver Prices, According to Veteran Trader – Here’s His Price Targets
body: A widely followed cryptocurrency analyst and trader says silver is about to have a massive breakout. The analyst pseudonymously known as Bluntz tells his 320,800 followers on the social media platform X that silver may start to outshine gold, which has been hitting new all-time highs. “Silver gearing up for the next major leg up in my opinion, gold probs about to take a backseat for a bit as gold-to-silver ratio starting diverge heavily again on low timeframes.” Source: Bluntz/X Bluntz practices Elliott Wave theory, which states that a bullish asset tends to go through a five-wave move up before an ABC correction. Based on the trader’s chart, he appears to suggest that silver is in the process of its third-wave surge. He predicts silver may reach the $40 level, then have a slight correction before soaring to around $43. Bluntz also says other indications of a silver breakout include the possible formation of a bullish inverse head-and-shoulders (IHS) pattern against the S&P 500 (XAG/SPX) on the monthly chart. “Four months later and now silver is also on the cusp of the same massive breakout against equities. Four year IHS breakout brewing with volume increasing substantially in the breakout. Multiple extremely high timeframe bull divergence. Decade-long downtrend broken.” Source: Bluntz/X Bluntz also says gold may hit a new all-time high within weeks. “$3,400 resistance cleared and coming in on the all-time high test. Gold still looking crazy bullish and I think we see $3,800 within a few weeks.” Source: Bluntz/X Gold is trading for $3,414 at time of writing. Meanwhile, the gold/silver ratio, which measures the number of ounces of silver required to purchase one ounce of gold, is currently at 93. At time of writing, silver is worth $36.42. title: XRP Melting Faces Phase 2: Analyst Says Don’t Get Distracted, Set Price Target
body: Prominent crypto analyst Dark Defender has issued a compelling technical update, signaling that XRP has officially entered what he terms “Melting Faces Phase 2.” Backed by a meticulously structured macro chart, the analysis places XRP at the threshold of a significant price expansion, with current trading levels marked at $2.31. The breakout, according to Dark Defender , is not impending — it is already in progress. His message to the community is sharp and timely: “Don’t get distracted.” Structural Continuity: A Decade-Spanning Cup-and-Handle Pattern The chart presents a sweeping, long-term view of XRP’s price action, revealing a multi-phase cup-and-handle formation that spans more than ten years. This structure is not new to XRP; rather, it echoes a familiar rhythm observed in previous market cycles. In particular, it mirrors the 2017 breakout that propelled XRP from sub-cent levels to over $3.00 — only this time, the scale and technical maturity appear more substantial. #XRP Melting Faces, Phase II Don't get distracted. #XRPArmy #Ripple pic.twitter.com/Dd8nnaIK39 — Dark Defender (@DefendDark) June 16, 2025 The chart outlines three distinct cup-and-handle patterns across the monthly timeframe, each leading into a vertical breakout phase. The most recent formation, drawn with bold arcs, has now completed its handle. A green label reading “WE ARE HERE” is prominently placed just above the resistance curve, confirming XRP’s breakout from the handle zone. The previous consolidation range, labeled “Dark,” reflects the years-long period of stagnation and uncertainty now decisively left behind. Confirmation from the Cloud In addition to classical chart patterns, the analysis incorporates the Ichimoku Cloud — a widely respected indicator of trend momentum and support/resistance zones. XRP’s position well above the cloud on the monthly chart signals a strong shift in market structure. Historically, XRP’s breakouts above the Ichimoku Cloud have aligned with accelerated bullish phases, and the current setup appears to follow that precedent. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 This breakout from the cloud is more than symbolic. It reflects a convergence of technical strength, investor confidence, and macro-pattern alignment, reinforcing the validity of the structure and its implications for XRP’s price trajectory. Clear Technical Targets: $18.22 and $34.62 Perhaps most notably, Dark Defender sets precise Fibonacci extension targets to guide expectations. The 1.618 extension level, often associated with the first leg of a breakout, is placed at $18.22. The more extended 2.618 level projects a price of $34.62, aligning with historical precedents where XRP followed deep Fibonacci expansions during parabolic rallies. These targets are not speculative; they are derived directly from the depth and resolution of the macro cup-and-handle formation. Given XRP’s track record of respecting these technical metrics, they carry weight within Dark Defender’s analysis and offer a roadmap for what could follow. Focused Guidance: Ignore Distractions, Follow the Chart While many in the crypto space remain fixated on external factors such as regulation or macroeconomic conditions, Dark Defender’s approach is deliberately minimalist. He avoids commentary on fundamentals, instead allowing the chart’s structure and history to speak for themselves. In doing so, he urges XRP holders to maintain clarity of purpose: the breakout has occurred, the trend is established, and the technical framework is intact. His parting note is unambiguous. With XRP trading above $2.30, a point earlier declared decisive, and all indicators aligned, the time for hesitation has passed. This is XRP Melting Faces Phase 2 — the phase where historical patterns return, technical signals converge, and distraction is the greatest threat to opportunity. title: Unlocking Bullish Signals: Bitcoin Permanent Holder Demand Surges
body: BitcoinWorld Unlocking Bullish Signals: Bitcoin Permanent Holder Demand Surges Are you watching the Bitcoin market closely? If so, you might have noticed some interesting signals emerging from on-chain data. One particular metric, Bitcoin permanent holder demand, is currently flashing green, suggesting a significant shift in investor behavior that could have major implications for future price movements. Understanding the Rise in Bitcoin Permanent Holder Demand What exactly does it mean when we talk about “permanent holder demand”? This term, often used by on-chain analytics platforms like CryptoQuant, refers to the wallets and entities that are accumulating Bitcoin and showing little to no history of selling. These are the investors with a long-term perspective, often dubbed ‘hodlers’, who believe in Bitcoin’s future value and are essentially taking coins out of the readily tradable supply. The recent report from CryptoQuant highlighted a rapid increase in this specific type of Bitcoin demand . This isn’t just random buying; it’s accumulation by those who intend to hold onto their assets for extended periods, possibly years. Think of it as smart money or conviction capital entering or strengthening its position in the market. Why is High Bitcoin Demand From Long-Term Holders Significant? Historically, periods of strong accumulation by permanent holders have often preceded or accompanied major market rallies. Why? Because it indicates several key factors: Reduced Selling Pressure: When long-term investors are buying and holding, they aren’t selling. This reduces the amount of Bitcoin available on exchanges, making it harder for large sell-offs to occur and easier for prices to rise on positive news or buying pressure. Strong Confidence: It signals that experienced and conviction-driven investors believe the current price levels represent a good opportunity for long-term gains. Their actions often influence others and build overall market confidence. Supply Shock Potential: If this accumulation continues, it can lead to a supply squeeze, where limited available Bitcoin meets rising demand, potentially leading to rapid price appreciation. This sustained Bitcoin demand from those with a long-term view is a powerful signal, often seen as a vote of confidence in Bitcoin’s future trajectory. Connecting the Dots: CryptoQuant Analysis and Market Trends The insights provided by platforms like CryptoQuant are invaluable for understanding the underlying market dynamics beyond just price charts. Their CryptoQuant analysis delves into the blockchain data, tracking the movement of coins between different types of wallets (exchanges, miners, long-term holders, short-term speculators). This level of detail allows analysts to identify trends that might not be immediately obvious. The specific metric highlighted – rising permanent holder demand – is a direct reflection of behavior on the blockchain. It’s not speculation based on news headlines; it’s an observation of actual coin movements. This makes on-chain data a powerful tool for identifying potential shifts in market sentiment and structure. Comparing current on-chain patterns to historical cycles, CryptoQuant analysts can often find correlations. For example, similar spikes in permanent holder accumulation were observed during the early phases of previous bull runs. While past performance is not indicative of future results, these historical precedents provide a framework for interpreting current data points. Implications for Bullish Bitcoin Momentum The confluence of rising Bitcoin permanent holder demand, reduced exchange supply, and historical precedents strongly suggests potential for bullish Bitcoin momentum. It paints a picture of a market where conviction is growing and selling pressure from a significant segment of holders is minimal. Does this guarantee an immediate price surge? No. The crypto market is influenced by many factors, including macroeconomic conditions, regulatory news, and short-term trading activity. However, the foundation being laid by long-term holders is a critical component for sustainable upward price movements. Consider the mechanics: If long-term holders continue to absorb supply, any significant buying pressure from institutions or even retail investors looking to enter or add to their positions will hit a market with less available supply on exchanges, potentially driving prices up more quickly and with less resistance. Actionable Insights for Long-Term Bitcoin Investors For individuals who consider themselves long-term Bitcoin investors , this analysis provides affirmation of their strategy. It suggests that the fundamental picture, based on the behavior of other conviction holders, remains strong. Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Continue to monitor on-chain metrics and analysis from reputable sources like CryptoQuant. Understanding these underlying trends can help you make more informed decisions. Review Your Strategy: If your goal is long-term accumulation, the current environment, characterized by strong holder demand, might reinforce that approach. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): For many long-term investors, continuing a DCA strategy can be effective, allowing you to accumulate more Bitcoin regardless of short-term price fluctuations, especially when the long-term outlook appears strong based on holder behavior. Manage Risk: While the signals are bullish, always invest within your means and understand the inherent volatility of the crypto market. The behavior of long-term Bitcoin investors is often a leading indicator of market health and future potential. Their current accumulation phase is a data point that shouldn’t be ignored. Summary: The Foundation for a Bullish Bitcoin Future? In conclusion, the analysis from CryptoQuant highlighting the significant increase in Bitcoin permanent holder demand is a compelling signal for the market. It indicates that investors with a long-term vision are actively accumulating Bitcoin, reducing the available supply on exchanges and demonstrating strong confidence in its future value. This trend, historically associated with the early stages of major rallies, provides a strong fundamental argument for potential bullish Bitcoin momentum. While short-term volatility remains a characteristic of the crypto market, the actions of long-term Bitcoin investors , as revealed by detailed CryptoQuant analysis of on-chain data, suggest that a solid foundation is being laid for future growth. Keeping an eye on this rising Bitcoin demand is crucial for anyone navigating the current market landscape. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action . This post Unlocking Bullish Signals: Bitcoin Permanent Holder Demand Surges first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: KuCoin CEO’s Commitment to Strengthening User Trust and Security Following the Launch of Its $2 Billion Trust Project
body: KuCoin cryptocurrency exchange launches its $2 billion Trust Project to advance security, enhance trust and boost innovation across its platform. The “fund” aims to secure KuCoin Exchange from potential threats and hacks, providing a secure, reliable space for all traders. In an open letter to KuCoin users, BC Wong, CEO of KuCoin Exchange, unveiled its $2 billion Trust Project, marking a new era in the company’s quest to protect users’ funds, enhance trust and mitigate any security risks such as hacks and theft. In his statement, Wong believes the huge “security fund” will enable KuCoin to provide users with a secure, reliable space where they can trade with confidence, especially following the constant security hiccups crypto exchanges have faced since early 2022. Terming the launch of the Trust Project, KuCoin’s “boldest move yet”, Wong shared. “Today, with the support of over 41 million users around the world, KuCoin represents the strength of innovation and integrity. The $2 billion Trust Project is more than a technological investment—it’s a promise to you, our users, and to the future of cryptocurrency. Now, we look to the future, where trust is more than a word; it’s the foundation of everything we do.” According to the statement, the Trust Project will be geared towards leveraging AI to identify risks and security concerns before they happen. The next generation project will combine AI to identify risks before they arise, and blockchain technology to offer real-time transparency of reserves. This is expected to not only respond to threats but also keep users’ funds safe from future attacks. A Half-Decade Championing Trust and Security KuCoin Exchange came to the limelight in 2020, offering users a wide range of crypto trading pairs and futuristic services in the space. While their competitors focused mainly on adding to their user base through new products and assets, the exchange focused on building a secure and trustworthy environment for their global community. “Over these five years, we’ve invested heavily in cutting-edge security infrastructure, protecting your assets and data through rigorous protocols and advanced technologies,” Wong wrote in his letter. This was crucial in protecting the exchange during the avalanche of hacks and failures that rocked the crypto space following the failure of FTX Exchange (the then 3rd largest crypto exchange) in 2022. KuCoin was able to respond proactively, enhancing transparency and accountability to better protect users’ interests. “Subsequent challenges only reaffirmed the importance of robust security measures, encouraging the entire industry to prioritise transparency and invest in stronger safeguards,” Wong added. In 2022, KuCoin launched its Proof-of-Reserves (PoR) initiative that enhanced users' trust in the exchange’s willingness to protect their funds. The constant security-led focus on the exchange earned KuCoin SOC 2 Type II Certification as well as the ISO 27001:2022 certifications. This places KuCoin among the most secure global platforms, meeting the highest international standards. Notwithstanding, KuCoin also boasts five regulatory licences across the globe and is pursuing a MiCAR license in Vienna, Austria, to further ensure compliance and transparency, while expanding its global reach. Security As The Bedrock of KuCoin According to Wong, KuCoin’s main mission is to provide users with unwavering and comprehensive security standardisation. The exchange accomplishes this by empowering the team to tackle risks, including sophisticated threats like advanced persistent threats (APTs). Additionally, the exchange employs a zero-trust architecture that ensures every access request is verified, leaving no room for vulnerabilities. Sensitive data privacy protections keep users’ personal information safe under the highest standards, while high-security key management devices shield encryption keys, strengthening their overall defences. Moreover, Kucoin also has in-built redundant systems within its infrastructure and operations that ensure reliability even under pressure. It also maintains a round-the-clock maintenance on its platform to prevent any downtime on trading, making continuous operations especially critical in the Web3 industry. Finally, the trading system introduces forward-thinking features, such as raft replay capabilities, which support comprehensive future audits. In addition to internal reviews, KuCoin also undergoes independent third-party audits. This approach ties together security, stability, and transparency into a seamless promise: a platform users can rely on, built from the ground up with their trust in mind. Enhancing Crypto Security Via Collaboration Adding to the extensive security measures that KuCoin employs, Wong also called for collaborative measures across the industry to raise security standards and rebuild trust. He believes the wider crypto industry has to work together to ensure a collective safe space for all users. “The potential of cryptocurrency to transform finance and empower people globally depends on our shared dedication to transparency, innovation, and accountability,” Wong stated on the value of collaboration across the crypto field. “We urge our industry peers to join us—invest in cutting-edge security, prioritize user protection, and help lay a stronger foundation for the future of crypto.” Lastly, the prevalence and growth of the KCS token (KuCoin’s native token), also enhance users’ participation in the governance and future of the project, giving them a voice on how security is handled across the platform. title: Top 3 Altcoins to Buy Today: Celestia (TIA), AAVE & Avalanche (AVAX) Offer Final Low Prices
body: Discover the most promising altcoins poised for growth. As the market shows signs of potential rebounds, a few standout digital currencies are catching the eye of investors. This article explores three altcoins that are currently available at attractive prices and could soon surge in value. Find out which cryptocurrencies are set to rise. Celestia Price Review: Past Drops and Key Levels in Focus Celestia saw a steep month-long drop nearing 33% and a drastic 72% plunge over the last six months. The coin’s weekly change of roughly -12% further deepened the bearish pressure during this period. Price action over time shows a marked downturn with sustained selling and diminishing investor confidence, reflecting a challenging landscape for holders throughout recent months. The current trading range hovers between $1.70 and $3.05, with immediate resistance emerging at $3.91 and solid support around $1.20. While the price remains constrained within these bands, technical indicators point to a bearish bias, indicated by negative trends in momentum and oscillators along with an RSI close to oversold levels. The market is unsettled with no clear trend as bears dominate. Traders might watch for a bounce off $1.20 support or a break above $3.91 that could signal a shift. Cautious buying near support and tight stop-loss orders could serve as viable strategies. Aave Price Analysis: Past Trends and Current Trading Levels Aave experienced a 20.84% increase over the past month, reflecting strong short-term momentum amid renewed investor interest. Over the last six months, its price fell by 22.82%, indicating the lingering effects of earlier market downturns and overall volatility. A weekly gain of 9.83% further highlights this bullish phase, contrasting the prolonged decline. These trends illustrate a market characterized by quick rallies and persistent bear pressures, showcasing a mix of recent buying strength and longer-term struggles. At present, Aave’s trading range spans from approximately $179.40 to $298.70, with price movements closely watched by market participants. The immediate resistance level near $350.42 presents a critical hurdle for further gains, while support at around $111.81 serves as a buffer against sharp declines. Traders are eyeing a second resistance at roughly $469.73 if the bullish drive continues. Technical indicators reflect a moderately balanced sentiment, with a slight buying bias. Current momentum reinforces steady buyer activity amid volatility. Trading opportunities may arise between support and resistance levels, with strategies involving tight stop-loss orders. Avalanche Market Analysis: Recent Decline Amid Key Price Zones AVAX experienced a 15.69% decline over the past month and a steep 59.45% drop in the last six months. A weekly decrease of 7.63% highlights the ongoing pressure on prices. The coin has shown significant value loss, with recent movements putting downward pressure on the overall trend. Price fluctuations have remained between approximately $17 and $25, signaling high volatility in AVAX's recent behavior. The general performance reflects bearish sentiment, as seen in the consistent declines and weakening momentum in standard oscillators. Current prices are positioned between $17.67 and $25.40, with resistance near $29.98 and another level around $37.70. Support is established at $14.52 and further down at $6.79. title: Crypto ETPs: 21Shares Makes Strategic Expansion on Nasdaq Stockholm
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto ETPs: 21Shares Makes Strategic Expansion on Nasdaq Stockholm Exciting news from the world of digital asset investments! 21Shares, a prominent issuer of crypto-backed Exchange Traded Products (ETPs), has announced a significant expansion of its product lineup available on Nasdaq Stockholm. This move opens up new avenues for investors seeking exposure to a wider range of cryptocurrencies through regulated and familiar investment structures like Crypto ETPs . 21Shares Brings New Crypto ETPs to Nasdaq Stockholm According to a press release distributed via Globe Newswire, 21Shares has successfully listed five new crypto ETPs on the Nasdaq Stockholm exchange. This strategic listing brings the total number of 21Shares products available on this major European exchange to a considerable figure, reinforcing the growing demand for regulated access to the crypto market. The newly listed products cover a diverse set of digital assets, reflecting the evolving landscape of the crypto ecosystem beyond just Bitcoin and Ethereum. The five new ETPs are: AUNI: Tracking Uniswap (UNI), a leading decentralized exchange protocol. AVAX: Providing exposure to Avalanche (AVAX), a fast and scalable blockchain platform. BOLD: Focused on Bitcoin Gold (BTG), a fork of Bitcoin aiming for decentralized mining. CSOL: A Solana Core Staking ETP, offering potential staking rewards alongside price exposure to Solana (SOL). ETHC: An Ethereum Core ETP, providing direct price exposure to Ethereum (ETH). This listing on Nasdaq Stockholm is particularly noteworthy because it provides investors within the exchange’s reach with easier access to these specific digital assets without the complexities often associated with direct cryptocurrency ownership, such as setting up wallets, managing private keys, or dealing with potentially unregulated exchanges. What Exactly Are Crypto ETPs and Why Choose Them? For those new to the concept, Crypto ETPs (Exchange Traded Products) are financial instruments that track the performance of an underlying cryptocurrency or basket of cryptocurrencies. They trade on regulated stock exchanges, much like stocks or traditional ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds). Choosing a crypto ETP over direct crypto ownership offers several potential benefits, especially for traditional investors or institutions: Accessibility: They can be bought and sold through standard brokerage accounts, making them accessible to a broader investor base already familiar with traditional markets. Regulation: Trading on regulated exchanges like Nasdaq Stockholm provides a layer of oversight and investor protection that might not be present on all cryptocurrency exchanges. Custody: The ETP issuer is responsible for securely holding the underlying crypto assets, removing the burden of self-custody and the risks associated with losing private keys or exchange hacks. Liquidity: ETPs trade on liquid exchanges, allowing for easier entry and exit from positions. Diversification: Some ETPs track baskets of assets, offering instant diversification. The new 21Shares listings also offer diversification across different types of crypto assets (DeFi, smart contracts, Bitcoin forks, staking products). However, it’s also important to consider the potential challenges and differences: Fees: ETPs typically charge a management fee (expense ratio) to cover operational costs, which is not a factor with direct ownership. Tracking Error: The ETP’s performance might not perfectly mirror the underlying asset’s performance due to fees, operational factors, or tracking methodologies. No Direct Control: You do not own the underlying cryptocurrency directly, meaning you cannot use it for transactions, participate in governance (unless the ETP structure allows, like the staking product), or benefit from airdrops or forks unless specifically handled by the issuer. Market Hours: ETPs trade during traditional stock market hours, unlike crypto markets which trade 24/7. Deep Dive: The Specifics of the New 21Shares ETPs Let’s take a closer look at the assets underlying the new 21Shares ETPs now trading on Nasdaq Stockholm : Uniswap (AUNI): Uniswap is the largest decentralized exchange (DEX) protocol by trading volume. The UNI token is its governance token, allowing holders to participate in the protocol’s future development. An ETP tracking UNI offers investors exposure to the decentralized finance (DeFi) sector’s growth through a key player. Avalanche (AVAX): Avalanche is a blockchain platform designed for launching decentralized applications (dApps) and enterprise blockchain deployments. It’s known for its speed and scalability. The AVAX ETP provides a way to invest in a prominent competitor in the smart contract platform space. Bitcoin Gold (BOLD): Bitcoin Gold is a fork of Bitcoin that aimed to make mining more accessible by changing the proof-of-work algorithm to one that is resistant to ASIC miners, allowing mining with standard GPUs. While perhaps less prominent than other assets, its inclusion offers a niche exposure within the Bitcoin ecosystem. Solana Core Staking (CSOL): This is a particularly interesting product. Solana (SOL) is a high-performance blockchain platform. The CSOL ETP not only tracks the price of SOL but is also designed to potentially provide the yield generated from staking the underlying SOL. Staking involves locking up tokens to support network operations and earn rewards, offering a potential source of passive income alongside price appreciation. The Solana ETP with staking is an example of ETPs evolving to capture more aspects of crypto economics. Ethereum Core (ETHC): Ethereum (ETH) is the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization and the leading platform for dApps, NFTs, and DeFi. The ETHC ETP offers straightforward price exposure to Ethereum, which is a core holding for many crypto investors and a foundational asset for the broader Web3 ecosystem. The availability of these specific products on Nasdaq Stockholm reflects 21Shares’ strategy to offer targeted exposure to key sectors and assets within the crypto market, catering to investor demand for specific themes like DeFi (Uniswap), high-throughput blockchains (Avalanche, Solana), and foundational assets (Ethereum). Why Nasdaq Stockholm is a Key Platform for Digital Assets Listing on an exchange like Nasdaq Stockholm is a significant step for crypto products. Nasdaq is a globally recognized exchange group known for its technology and market infrastructure. Stockholm’s exchange operates within a well-established European regulatory framework, which is crucial for attracting institutional investors and providing confidence to retail investors. For 21Shares , listing on such a reputable platform validates their products and makes them easily discoverable and tradable alongside traditional securities. For investors, it means they can access these digital assets through their existing brokerage accounts, benefiting from the transparency, security, and operational standards associated with a major regulated exchange. This move further solidifies Nasdaq Stockholm’s position as a key venue for trading regulated digital asset products in Europe, contributing to the mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies as an asset class. Benefits for Investors Seeking Crypto Exposure via ETPs If you’re an investor looking to add cryptocurrencies to your portfolio but are hesitant about the technical aspects of direct ownership or the regulatory uncertainty of some crypto exchanges, Crypto ETPs offer a compelling alternative. The listing of these new 21Shares products on Nasdaq Stockholm specifically enhances these benefits: Simplified Investment Process: Buying an ETP is as easy as buying a stock through your broker. Regulatory Clarity: Trading on a regulated exchange provides legal and operational certainty. Institutional Participation: ETPs are the preferred vehicle for many institutions to gain crypto exposure, potentially increasing market liquidity and credibility. Access to Specific Assets: Instead of buying a broad index, you can target specific assets like Uniswap or Avalanche based on your research and investment thesis. The Uniswap ETP and Solana ETP are prime examples of this targeted access. Potential for Staking Rewards: Products like the Solana Core Staking ETP introduce the possibility of earning yield, mirroring another feature of direct crypto ownership in a regulated format. This expansion provides more granular options for investors who want exposure to specific narratives within the crypto market, such as the growth of DeFi, alternative layer-1 blockchains, or even specific aspects like staking yield, all within a regulated wrapper. Navigating the Landscape of Crypto ETPs: Actionable Insights Before investing in any Crypto ETP , including the new ones from 21Shares on Nasdaq Stockholm , consider these actionable insights: Understand the Underlying Asset: Research Uniswap, Avalanche, Solana, Bitcoin Gold, and Ethereum. What are their use cases, market position, and risks? Review the ETP Prospectus: Understand the ETP’s specific structure, fees (expense ratio), tracking methodology, and how it handles the underlying asset (physical backing vs. synthetic). Consider Your Brokerage Access: Ensure your brokerage platform allows trading of these specific ETPs on Nasdaq Stockholm. Assess Your Risk Tolerance: Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile. While ETPs offer regulated access, they track assets whose prices can fluctuate dramatically. Compare Products: If other ETPs for the same asset exist, compare their fees, issuer reputation (like 21Shares ), and structure. Be Aware of Market Hours: Remember you can only trade the ETP during exchange hours, unlike the 24/7 crypto market. Investing in a Solana ETP or a Uniswap ETP requires the same due diligence as investing directly in the tokens, plus an understanding of the ETP wrapper itself. The Future of 21Shares and Regulated Crypto Products The continuous listing of new products by issuers like 21Shares on major exchanges like Nasdaq Stockholm signals a clear trend: the increasing integration of digital assets into traditional financial markets. As regulatory clarity improves globally, we can expect more such products and listings. 21Shares is at the forefront of this movement, consistently expanding its product suite to cover a wider array of digital assets and investment strategies (like staking). This not only benefits investors seeking regulated access but also contributes to the overall maturity and legitimacy of the crypto market in the eyes of traditional finance. The availability of a Solana ETP , a Uniswap ETP , and others on a major regulated exchange is a testament to the growing acceptance and institutional interest in these assets. Summary: Expanding Access to Digital Assets The listing of five new Crypto ETPs by 21Shares on Nasdaq Stockholm marks a significant step in making a more diverse range of digital assets accessible to traditional investors. Products tracking Uniswap, Avalanche, Bitcoin Gold, Solana (with staking), and Ethereum are now available through a regulated and familiar exchange environment. This expansion highlights the increasing demand for regulated crypto investment vehicles and solidifies Nasdaq Stockholm’s role as a key European hub for digital asset trading. While offering numerous benefits like ease of access and regulatory oversight, investors should always conduct thorough research into the underlying assets and the ETP structure itself before investing in products like the Uniswap ETP or the Solana ETP . As the crypto market continues to evolve, initiatives like this from 21Shares play a crucial role in bridging the gap between traditional finance and the innovative world of digital assets, providing investors with more options to participate in this exciting space. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital assets institutional adoption. This post Crypto ETPs: 21Shares Makes Strategic Expansion on Nasdaq Stockholm first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team
